html:
You’re not my mentor
Woman change that diaper
Take care of your business
You’re not my mentor
When the birds sing
Galaxies collide
Billions of worlds perish
Chronos turns the hourglass
Woman why do you hurt me
Where is your antipathy from
We’rę from one womb after all
What corrupts your mind
Kites on spring wind
In deep forest wolves
It’s not time for mushrooms yet
Tomorrow also comes
title: Mentor
